Class SimpleIpmPluginLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blockhaus2000.plugin.SimpleIpmPluginLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IpmPluginLoader

    public class SimpleIpmPluginLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements IpmPluginLoader
    An implementation of IpmPluginLoader.
    Author:
    Blockhaus2000

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Class<?> getClassByName(java.lang.String className)
      Searchs for a (full-qualified) class name in all IpmPluginClassLoader from all plugins.
      static IpmPluginLoader getInstance()
      Will provide singleton.
      IpmPlugin load(java.io.File file)
      Loads and returns an instance of the IpmPlugin that is represented by the given File.
      IpmPlugin load(java.lang.String pluginName)
      Will call IpmPluginLoader.load(File) with file as a new File with the path to the plugin-jar (the suffix .jar will be added automaticly).
      java.util.Set<IpmPlugin> loadAll()
      Loads all plugins (represented by jar files) in the plugins folder in the data folder of the root plugin (the InternalPluginManager).

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public IpmPlugin load(java.io.File file)
               throws PluginException
        Loads and returns an instance of the IpmPlugin that is represented by the given File.

        NOTE: Has to contains a plugin.yml if the root folder.

        Specified by:
        load in interface IpmPluginLoader
        Parameters:
        file - The File that contains the IpmPlugin.
        Returns:
        An instance of the IpmPlugin that is represented by the File.
        Throws:
        PluginException - If an error occurred (for example, if no plugin.yml can be found).
        See Also:
        IpmPluginLoader.load(java.io.File)

      • load

        public IpmPlugin load(java.lang.String pluginName)
               throws PluginException
        Will call IpmPluginLoader.load(File) with file as a new File with the path to the plugin-jar (the suffix .jar will be added automaticly).
        Specified by:
        load in interface IpmPluginLoader
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the jar file to load.
        Returns:
        The return of IpmPluginLoader.load(File).
        Throws:
        PluginException - Will be thrown if IpmPluginLoader.load(File) throws it.
        See Also:
        IpmPluginLoader.load(java.lang.String)

      • loadAll

        public java.util.Set<IpmPlugin> loadAll()
                                 throws PluginException
        Loads all plugins (represented by jar files) in the plugins folder in the data folder of the root plugin (the InternalPluginManager). Will call IpmPluginLoader.load(File) with all jar file that was found.
        Specified by:
        loadAll in interface IpmPluginLoader
        Returns:
        A Set of instances IpmPlugins that are represented by the jar files in the plugins folder.
        Throws:
        PluginException - Will be thrown if IpmPluginLoader.load(File) throws it.
        See Also:
        IpmPluginLoader.loadAll()

      • getClassByName

        public java.lang.Class<?> getClassByName(java.lang.String className)
        Searchs for a (full-qualified) class name in all IpmPluginClassLoader from all plugins.
        Specified by:
        getClassByName in interface IpmPluginLoader
        Parameters:
        className - The full-qualified class name to search for.
        Returns:
        The class that was found. If nothing was found, this returns null.
        See Also:
        IpmPluginLoader.getClassByName(java.lang.String)

      • getInstance

        public static IpmPluginLoader getInstance()
        Will provide singleton.
        Returns:
        An instance of SimpleIpmServer.
